lead_paragraph: The Fulbright resolution is a declaration of policy written in broad language so that any kind of settlement may be made ranging from a temporary treaty limiting peace for a short period to an irrevocable league of nations to preserve democracy and world peace. It is too radical for the conservatives and too conservative for the liberals.
abstract: lr terming Fulbright resolution inadequate guarantee of people's peace
